history.title: Our History
history.description: The history of GMVP Asesoramiento Financiero y Crediticio began in 2015 when we identified a real need in the Colombian market: the lack of specialized guidance for people facing difficulties with credit bureaus. Since then, we have developed effective strategies to help our clients recover their financial health and access new credit opportunities.

2015.title: The Beginning of a Vision
2015.description: We founded GMVP Asesoramiento Financiero y Crediticio, with the conviction that everyone deserves a second financial opportunity. We were born to be the bridge between credit difficulties and a prosperous financial future.

2016.title: Development of Specialized Methodologies
2016.description: We developed innovative and effective strategies to help our clients get out of the main credit bureaus: CIFIN-TRANSUNION, DATACREDITO and EXPERIAN.

2018.title: Expansion and Diversification
2018.description: We expanded our service portfolio to serve both individuals and legal entities, offering comprehensive financial advisory and credit facilitation solutions.

2022.title: Innovation in Placements
2022.description: We implemented our credit program, helping our clients obtain their first credit or reactivate their credit history through cooperatives with the backing of reliable financial institutions.

2025.title: Consolidated Leadership
2025.description: Today we are recognized as leaders in financial advisory, with a solid track record and hundreds of successful cases that support our experience and commitment.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about our services

questions.q1: How long does the financial advisory process take?
questions.a1: The complete process takes between 60 and 120 days depending on the case. We work efficiently to obtain results as quickly as possible.
questions.q2: What documents do I need to request a service?
questions.a2: The basic documents are: identity document, income certificates, and depending on the service, additional specific information. We guide you through the entire process.
questions.q3: Is there a guarantee on the services?
questions.a3: Yes, we offer a satisfaction guarantee. Our process is designed to deliver real and verifiable results.
questions.a4: Absolutely. Many of our clients combine financial advisory with portfolio purchase or revolving credit to achieve better results, through the cooperative or financial sector.
questions.q5: Do you serve all of Colombia?
questions.a5: We serve in person in Bogotá D.C., Armenia, Quindío, Pereira Risaralda, and virtually throughout Colombia and abroad.

whatAre.title: What are Cookies?
whatAre.description: Cookies are a tool used by Web servers to store and retrieve information about their visitors. It is nothing more than a text file that some servers ask our browser to write to our hard drive, with information about what we have been doing on their pages. They have an expiration date, which can range from the duration of the session to a specified future date, after which they cease to be operational.

Remember your settings during and between visits
